name: Rogue Idea
description:
Mouse control only.

The basic progression of the game is as follows:

  1. Choose one of the three paths.
  2. Fight enemies and pick up treasures along the way.
  3. When you reach a staircase to go down, proceed to the next level.
  4. Continue until you die or defeat the Dark Wizard.

The light red number at the top of the screen is your hit points. When this number reaches zero, you die.

The light yellow number indicates your hunger.
When your hunger reaches zero, you will not die immediately, but you will gradually lose hit points. There is no way to recover your hunger.

When you hover the cursor over a monster in battle, the monster's status will be displayed.

When your inventory is full, you must remove some items to make room in your inventory, or destroy the contents of your treasure chest. When the trash can icon is green, the clicked item will be discarded.
